Name: The Lone Ranger
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Very slightly sweet tequila and lemon, lengthened and dried with brut sparkling wine.
History: Created in 2012 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler , Oregon, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Lone Ranger contains 190 calories
